name: NanoRacks
overview:
NanoRacks provides the ultimate â€˜Plug and Playâ€™ microgravity research facilities allowing small standardized payloads to be plugged into any of our platforms, providing interface with the Space Station power and data capabilities.

Our philosophy is to bring together three concepts as our driving force: low-cost, standardization of hardware, and understanding the customer. We like to believe that in space, small is the new big. Read more about our vision.

Our company brings together entrepreneurs, scientists and engineers who have real-life experience and share a passion for space including humanityâ€™s utilization of low-earth orbit. Find out more about our team.

NanoRacks enjoys partnerships with a growing list of world-class organizations that allows us to provide seamless support from customer interface to payload development to space shuttle and space station integration. Find out more about our partners.
